Title: A Game Agent Design Method in Simulation Training System
Abstract: during the simulation training process the two sides involved in the training used the simulation training system to carry out a force confrontation. the design of game agents is the core problem that needs to be studied. firstly the implementation of the game adversarial framework in the simulation training system is expounded. then the basic functional structure of intelligent forces is expounded. then a game agent design method based on large language model kernel is proposed and the execution process of the design method is elaborated. finally the specific application is carried out in the simulation training system which proves the effectiveness of the proposed method.
